ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:61}); // {Aeris}
“I told you.
I'm used to danger.”{PAUSE}{Aeris}
“To tell you the truth,
my heart was pounding!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:41}); // {Aeris}
“I grew up in the slums…
I'm used to danger.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:47}); // “I told you not to wander around…
I tell ya, women nowadays…”{PAUSE}“Hurry up, will ya!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:63}); // Kotch
“Ha ha ha…
Wait, you…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:15}); // {Cloud}
“Slow down, let me answer.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:16}); // {Cloud}
“I'm dressed like this
because there was no other way
to get in here.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:17}); // {Cloud}
“I'm all right.
{Aeris} helped me out.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:19}); // {Cloud}
“{Tifa}, explain what you're
doing in a place like this?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:29}); // {Cloud}
“I see.
So you wanted the story
straight from Corneo's mouth.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:37}); // {Cloud}
“No, {Aeris}!
I can't involve you.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:38}); // {Aeris}
“Oh? So it's all right for
{Tifa} to be in danger?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:39}); // {Cloud}
“No, I don't want
{Tifa} in…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:48}); // {Cloud}
“I guess I don't need to ask but,
the other girl is…”{PAUSE}“me…right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:3}); // {Tifa}
“…And you are?”{PAUSE}“Hey you're the one with
{Cloud} in the park…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:7}); // {Tifa}
“What do you mean,
'Don't worry'…about what?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:8}); // {Tifa}
“No, don't misunderstand.”{PAUSE}“{Cloud} and
I grew up together.
Nothing more.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:25}); // {Tifa}
“When we got back from
the Sector 5 reactor,
we saw a weird man.”{PAUSE}“{Barret}
caught him and
squeezed some information
out of him.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:26}); // {Cloud}
“That's when
the Don's name popped up.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:27}); // {Tifa}
“Right, Don Corneo.”{PAUSE}“{Barret} told me
to leave
the lech alone…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:28}); // {Tifa}
“But something's
been bothering me.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:30}); // {Tifa}
“Well, I made it here,
but now I'm stuck.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:31}); // {Tifa}
“Corneo is looking for a bride.”{PAUSE}“Everyday, he gets three girls,
chooses one of them, and then…
…well…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:32}); // {Tifa}
“Anyway, I have to be the
…girl for tonight.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:49}); // {Tifa}
“You're right, you didn't need…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:22}); // {Aeris}
“Please, go on with
your private conversation.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:51}); // {Aeris}
“They're going to get suspicious
if we don't hurry.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // {Aeris}
“Nice to meet you.
I'm {Aeris}.”{PAUSE}“{Cloud}'s told me
a lot about you.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // {Aeris}
“Don't worry.
We just met. It's nothing.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:9}); // {Aeris}
“Poor {Cloud},
having to stand here and listen to
both of us call him nothing.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:21}); // {Aeris}
“Ahem!!
I'll just plug my ears.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:34}); // {Aeris}
“If you know the three girls,
there's no problem, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:36}); // {Aeris}
“We have two here,
right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:53}); // {Aeris}
“Embarrassed?
Come on, speak up!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:46}); // “It's time, ladies.
The Don is waiting!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:59}); // Kotch
“C'mon…just once…
I won't tell…I promise!”{PAUSE}“I just wanted to act like I got a
a cute girl…”{PAUSE}“Just once!”
createLineTrigger({x1:-62, y1:217, z1:0, x2:-87, y2:1, z2:0});

ops.raw: d0 cd ff d7 fe 00 00 b6 ff 27 ff 00 00

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:64}); // Kotch
“Hey! You're…not them…
you're…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:67}); // Kotch
“Thanks!”{PAUSE}“You know what? After you left, some
Shinra guys forced themselves in
here saying someone 'leaked information'
and we're 'good for nothings'."{PAUSE}“They took Don somewhere and that's it…
I'm still here.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:68}); // Kotch
“Oops!
They're here again…
I'm outta here! SEE ya”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:66}); // Kotch
“I…I was just following
the Don's orders! Help me!”

and we're 'good for nothings'."{PAUSE}“They took Don somewhere and that's it…
I'm still here.”

They're here again…
I'm outta here! SEE ya”

“I…I was just following
the Don's orders! Help me!”

dialogStrings:
{Aeris}
“Nice to meet you.
I'm {Aeris}.”{PAUSE}“{Cloud}'s told me
a lot about you.”

{Tifa}
“…And you are?”{PAUSE}“Hey you're the one with
{Cloud} in the park…”

{Aeris}
“Don't worry.
We just met. It's nothing.”

{Tifa}
“No, don't misunderstand.”{PAUSE}“{Cloud} and
I grew up together.
Nothing more.”

{Aeris}
“Poor {Cloud},
having to stand here and listen to
both of us call him nothing.”

{Tifa}
“Why are you dressed like that!?
And what are you doing here!?”{PAUSE}“Never mind,
what happened to you after
the fall!? Are you hurt!?”

{Cloud}
“I'm dressed like this
because there was no other way
to get in here.”

{Cloud}
“{Tifa}, explain what you're
doing in a place like this?”

{Aeris}
“Please, go on with
your private conversation.”

{Tifa}
“When we got back from
the Sector 5 reactor,
we saw a weird man.”{PAUSE}“{Barret}
caught him and
squeezed some information
out of him.”

{Cloud}
“That's when
the Don's name popped up.”

{Tifa}
“Right, Don Corneo.”{PAUSE}“{Barret} told me
to leave
the lech alone…”

{Cloud}
“I see.
So you wanted the story
straight from Corneo's mouth.”

{Tifa}
“Well, I made it here,
but now I'm stuck.”

{Tifa}
“Corneo is looking for a bride.”{PAUSE}“Everyday, he gets three girls,
chooses one of them, and then…
…well…”

{Tifa}
“Anyway, I have to be the
…girl for tonight.”

{Aeris}
“If you know the three girls,
there's no problem, right?”

{Aeris}
“Oh? So it's all right for
{Tifa} to be in danger?”

{Aeris}
“I grew up in the slums…
I'm used to danger.”

“It's time, ladies.
The Don is waiting!”

“I told you not to wander around…
I tell ya, women nowadays…”{PAUSE}“Hurry up, will ya!”

{Cloud}
“I guess I don't need to ask but,
the other girl is…”{PAUSE}“me…right?”

{Aeris}
“They're going to get suspicious
if we don't hurry.”

{Tifa}
“Ha ha. You know, you don't look bad,
if ya don't look closely.”{PAUSE}"I wonder what {Barret} would say
if he could see you?”

Kotch
“C'mon…just once…
I won't tell…I promise!”{PAUSE}“I just wanted to act like I got a
a cute girl…”{PAUSE}“Just once!”

{Aeris}
“I told you.
I'm used to danger.”{PAUSE}{Aeris}
“To tell you the truth,
my heart was pounding!”

Kotch
“I…I was just following
the Don's orders! Help me!”

Kotch
“Thanks!”{PAUSE}“You know what? After you left, some
Shinra guys forced themselves in
here saying someone 'leaked information'
and we're 'good for nothings'."{PAUSE}“They took Don somewhere and that's it…
I'm still here.”

Kotch
“Oops!
They're here again…
I'm outta here! SEE ya”

Turtle's Paradise
No. 2{PAUSE}One thing even the Gold Saucer
doesn't have is…{PAUSE}A good place for drinks
with a great atmosphere!{PAUSE}Come on by and see us
at "Turtle's Paradise"
